summary: By the third vine-harvest it was obvious to everyone that they loathed each other.One Friday evening, Pierre was down in the winery, working on a new electric winepress. The angel that Pierre had married in Madagascar had become a termagant, blinded by jealousy. She started with insinuations, simple, artless ones that Pierre hardly even recognized. When he denied that, she resorted to violent, humiliating denouncements in the kitchens, the winery, the plantations. Then she tried blunt accusation in the privacy of their bedroom
